name: Stock Quantity changes over time
query:
SELECT posting_date, 
               SUM(IF(actual_qty > 0, actual_qty, 0)) AS stock_added, 
               SUM(IF(actual_qty < 0, ABS(actual_qty), 0)) AS stock_deducted
        FROM `tabStock Ledger Entry`
        GROUP BY posting_date
        ORDER BY posting_date
